text: Great, I would also try to find some more challenging green/bluescreens as often in production they are a lot gnarlier. Also for you first job make sure you have plenty of roto and prep work as that's probably what you'll do first. Maybe add a screen replacement shot of a phone as that comes up a lot at smaller companies.
